sub_fields.label: Height Desktop
sub_fields.name: min_height_desktop
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a number to define the banner height in pixels (e.g. 400 = 400px). If left empty, a default value will be used. ( min-height: 512px; )

sub_fields.label: Height Mobile
sub_fields.name: min_height_mobile
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a number to define the banner height in pixels (e.g. 400 = 400px). If left empty, a default value will be used. ( min-height: 512px; )

sub_fields.label: Height Desktop
sub_fields.name: min_height_desktop
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a number to define the banner height in pixels (e.g. 400 = 400px). If left empty, a default value will be used. ( min-height: 512px; )

sub_fields.label: Content Alignement ( only if Content Width Full Width ) - Desktop
sub_fields.name: content_alignment

sub_fields.label: Content Alignement ( only if Content Width Full Width ) - Mobile
sub_fields.name: content_alignment_mobile

sub_fields.label: Space under Title Section [desktop]
sub_fields.name: margin_bottom_desktop
sub_fields.instructions:
Enter a nr to set the bottom spacing in pixels (e.g. 20 = 20px). 
If left empty, a default value of 6px will be applied.
